seo.title: Monterosso al Mare Overview 2025 | Complete Village Guide
seo.description: Complete overview of Monterosso al Mare. Two districts, sandy beaches, and the largest village in Cinque Terre.

body.title: Village Overview
body.subtitle: The largest and most resort-like of the five villages. Two distinct areas connected by tunnel: historic Old Town and beachfront Fegina.

features.title: Population
features.description: ~1,500 residents. Largest of the five villages.

features.title: Beaches
features.description: Only sandy beaches in Cinque Terre. Free and paid areas.

features.title: Transport
features.description: Largest station. Best base for exploring all villages.

features.title: Accommodations
features.description: Best selection of hotels, apartments, and restaurants.

features.title: Old Town
features.description: Medieval center with narrow streets and historic churches.

features.title: Hiking
features.description: Start of Blue Trail to Vernazza. Most scenic section.
